Node.definition: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ Shuhite (שׁוּחִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= member of ethnic group ◄ possibly founded by Shuah (שׁוּחַ) son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Keturah (קְטוּרָה)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
particle linking an event to a point in time; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in time Y

= referent to an unknown point in time; ► normally used with the purpose of finding out which point in time is intended; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that this point of time may never arrive
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
literally: breath or wind; hence: = action by which humans speak words with no substance or value
= state in which an event happens with intensity
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which someone turns patterns of behavior that ought to be right and just into morally or ethically unacceptable behavior
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God
= causative action by which someone turns patterns of behavior that ought to be right and just into morally or ethically unacceptable behavior

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= action by which humans or deities stop caring for (other) humans or objects as if that person or object has been sent away from their presence
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
= action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

Node.gloss: to beg for mercy|to make supplication
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans try to win a favorable attitude from deities or from other humans ◄ by approaching that deity or person in a very humble way
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: pure; hence: = state in which people are without any moral contamination
= person whose behavior is morally and ethically right
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= action by which someone ends a period of inactivity and comes into action, ◄ as if he had been sleeping for a certain time

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= point in time at which an event starts happening
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
literally: to grow; hence: = process by which a condition increases in significance and importance
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
literally: to establish; hence: = action by which humans try to obtain information about something
= action by which someone makes an effort to obtain information about events
= indirect male progenitor
= reference to the day before the current day; sometimes used to refer to a point of time in the recent past as if it happened the day before
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse, including those associated to him or her
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
literally: to bring out; hence: = action by which humans utter words
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to grow|to become tall|to become high|to rise
Node.definition: = process by which plants and other inanimate objects increase in height

= tall sedge with a smooth triangular stem, and multiple drooping, clustered flower stalks arising from the apex of the main stalk; ◄ |iCyperus papyrus|i*, found in the Nile (יְאֹר) valley; ► used for many different purposes in the Ancient Near East, such as writing material, ships, mattresses, furniture, rope, sandals, etc.
= an area of low lying land which is flooded in wet seasons or at high tide, and typically remains waterlogged at all times; a place where reeds (קָנֶה) and papyrus (גֹּמֶא) grow
= process by which a plant grows in size
= type of grass; ◄ found on the borders of the Nile (יְאֹר) ► eaten by cattle
= particle marking a proposition as not true
= state in which a plant or tree has developed blossoms
= causative action by which humans remove leaves, branches, fruits, or the entire stalk of a plant
= type of grass; ◄ plants; ► serves as food for animals; ≈ regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short lived
= process by which objects containing liquid essential to their existence lose these liquids ◄ due to some external or internal cause
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= state in which humans experience a desire for something to happen, together with a degree of confidence that this desire will be fulfilled through the intervention of someone else; as a result, they are willing to defer taking action for some time
= state in which humans are impure in character, without regard or respect for God

Node.gloss: to perish|to come to an end
Node.definition: = process by which an event comes to an end, usually under unfavorable circumstances
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= to experience a deep loathing for a person or condition
= state where humans feel confident◄ due to their reliance on God or something else for protection

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= eight legged creature that produces silken strands of web in which they catch their prey, mainly flying insects, such as flies, grasshoppers, and the like; ≈ associated with what is temporary and fragile
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
= young branch growing from the stump or stem of a tree or plant
literally: to come out; = process by which land or a living organism produces crops, branches, horns, or fruits
= a pile of stones, ► sometimes used as a memorial for an important event
= a part of a plant normally below ground, which acts as a support and collects water and nourishment, ≈ associated with well being, offspring, and the inclination of the mind
= to twine about one another

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible
= action by which humans focus their eyes on a group of people or objects in order to make a selection
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

= causative action by which deities or humans cause other humans and objects to be removed from existence in a violent way, as if by swallowing up, either by direct intervention or by accomplishing this through the hands of others
= action by which humans act in a way that is not loyal to the deity that they have promised to serve

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= pertaining to being different from other objects and events that are in the same range

Node.gloss: to sprout|to come up|to spring up
Node.definition: = process by which plants, trees, or hairs come up and start growing; ≈ sometimes extended to denote the coming in existence of people, conditions, or activities
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events

Node.gloss: to seize|to hold|to take hold|to grasp|to handle
Node.definition: = action by which humans take hold of other humans or objects with their hands; the agent role is often extended figuratively to include objects, deities and certain conditions
literally: (one's) hand is with (someone else); hence: = action by with humans or deities offer assistance to (other) humans

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
particle linking two events; = relation indicating that event X ends at the time of occurrence or completion of event Y
literally: to fill (with an activity); hence: = causative action in which deities cause humans to be fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant

= action by which humans give expression to a friendly attitude, joy and amusement with the gestures and sounds that normally accompany it; ≈ this is normally regarded as a good thing, especially when done with restraint, whereas a lack of restraint is often associated with foolishness
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= loud sound ◄ produced either by the human voice or by musical instruments ► used to express an emotion or to communicate something to a community
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to be clothed (with a certain state)
Node.definition: literally: to be clothed; hence: = process by which humans or deities attain a certain quality or status
= state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
